meanings.definition: A liquid mixture in which food is soaked before cooking.
meanings.sent1: I made a tasty marinade for the chicken.
meanings.sent2: The steak was left in the marinade overnight.
meanings.sent3: The marinade gave the meat a delicious flavor.
meanings.sent4: The marinade acted like a flavorful bath for the meat.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the marinade filled the kitchen.

meanings.definition: To soak food in a marinade.
meanings.sent1: I will marinade the shrimp for the barbecue.
meanings.sent2: She likes to marinade her tofu in soy sauce.
meanings.sent3: He accidentally marinaded the vegetables for too long.
meanings.sent4: The flavors marinade together perfectly in the fridge.
meanings.sent5: Marinading the meat tenderizes it for grilling.
